languages.text: {n}Мужчина вскидывает голову и будто впервые вас видит. Но стоит ему открыть рот, чтобы ответить вам, как он вздрагивает всем телом — и обводит помещение прояснившимся взглядом. Налитые кровью глаза расширяются от ужаса.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина вскидывает голову и будто впервые вас видит. Но стоит ему открыть рот, чтобы ответить вам, как он вздрагивает всем телом — и обводит помещение прояснившимся взглядом. Налитые кровью глаза расширяются от ужаса.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

languages.text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина вскидывает голову и будто впервые вас видит. Но стоит ему открыть рот, чтобы ответить вам, как он вздрагивает всем телом — и обводит помещение прояснившимся взглядом. Налитые кровью глаза расширяются от ужаса.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

{n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

languages.text: {n}男は初めてこちらを見たかのようにハッと顔を上げた。しかし、口を開いた途端、全身が震えだした…そして、正気を取り戻した目で部屋の中を見渡した。血走った目が恐怖で見開いた。{/n}「皇帝よ、我らをお守りください…」
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}男は初めてこちらを見たかのようにハッと顔を上げた。しかし、口を開いた途端、全身が震えだした――そして、正気を取り戻した目で部屋の中を見渡した。血走った目が恐怖で見開いた。{/n}「皇帝よ、我らをお守りください…」

languages.text: {n}这个男人猛地抬起头，显然是第一次注意到你。但当他张开嘴，准备回答问题的时候，他的整个身体突然开始颤抖起来。他刚刚回过神的目光掠过了房间，瞪大了满是血丝的眼睛。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑我们……”
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}这个男人猛地抬起头，显然是第一次注意到你。但当他张开嘴，准备回答问题的时候，他的整个身体突然开始颤抖起来。他刚刚回过神的目光掠过了房间，瞪大了满是血丝的眼睛。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑我们……”

languages.text: {n}El hombre levanta la cabeza como si te viera por primera vez. En cuanto abre la boca para responderte, su cuerpo entero empieza a temblar y recorre con su repentinamente clara vista la sala. Sus ojos, inyectados en sangre, se llenan de horror.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos proteja...».
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre levanta la cabeza como si te viera por primera vez. En cuanto abre la boca para responderte, su cuerpo entero empieza a temblar y recorre con su repentinamente clara vista la sala. Sus ojos, inyectados en sangre, se llenan de horror.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos proteja...».

languages.text: {n}L'homme sursaute, relève la tête et semble enfin remarquer votre présence. Mais à l'instant même où il ouvre la bouche pour vous répondre, son corps tout entier est pris de tremblements et son regard redevenu lucide balaie la pièce. Ses yeux injectés de sang s'écarquillent d'horreur.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous préserve... »
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme sursaute, relève la tête et semble enfin remarquer votre présence. Mais à l'instant même où il ouvre la bouche pour vous répondre, son corps tout entier est pris de tremblements et son regard redevenu lucide balaie la pièce. Ses yeux injectés de sang s'écarquillent d'horreur.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous préserve... »

languages.text: {n}Der Mann hebt seinen Kopf und nimmt dich anscheinend zum ersten Mal wirklich wahr. Doch als er den Mund öffnet, um zu antworten, zuckt plötzlich sein gesamter Körper – und sein nun klarer Blick wandert durch die Kammer. Seine blutunterlaufenen Augen weiten sich vor Angst.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann hebt seinen Kopf und nimmt dich anscheinend zum ersten Mal wirklich wahr. Doch als er den Mund öffnet, um zu antworten, zuckt plötzlich sein gesamter Körper – und sein nun klarer Blick wandert durch die Kammer. Seine blutunterlaufenen Augen weiten sich vor Angst.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns ..."

languages.text: {n}Adam başını silkiyor. Anlaşılan o ki seni ilk kez görüyor. Yanıt vermek için ağzını açtığında tüm bedeni titremeye başlıyor ve berraklaşmış bakışları odada geziniyor. Kanlanmış gözleri dehşet içinde açılıyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi esirgesin."
languages.original_text: {n}The man jerks his head up, apparently seeing you for the first time. But just as he opens his mouth to reply, his whole body begins to shudder — and his newly cleared gaze passes over the chamber. His blood-filled eyes go wide in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."
